movies.title: Weil du arm bist, mußt du früher sterben

biography.bio: Hans Christian Blech was born on February 20, 1915 in Darmstadt, Germany. He is known for his work on The Longest Day (1962), Colonel Redl (1985) and Wrong Move (1975). He was married to Erni Wilhelmi. He died on March 5, 1993 in Munich, Bavaria, Germany.
biography.name: Hans Christian Blech

biography.bio: Paula Braend was born on August 6, 1905 in Starnberg, Germany as Paula Braendlein. She was an actress, known for Die Bürgermeister (1964), Wenn der Hahn kräht (1964) and Witwen (1969). She died on October 4, 1989 in Munich, Bavaria, West Germany.
biography.name: Paula Braend

biography.bio: Johannes Buzalski was born on August 24, 1918. He was an actor, known for The Enigma of Kaspar Hauser (1974), Mark of the Devil (1970) and Hitler, un film d'Allemagne (1977). He died in July 1977 in Germany.
biography.name: Johannes Buzalski

biography.bio: First in Basel and Zurich Paul Boesiger was trained by Ernst Ginsberg and was on stage for some of the most important representations of the first plays of Friedrich Duerrenmatt and Max Frisch. In the early fifties he was discovered for the big screen by the famous German director Paul May for the 08/15 franchise. After having played in many outstanding German films Paul Boesiger decided in the early sixties to focus on stage acting and directing. First in Freiburg i. Br. and later in Nuernberg he left some unforgotten moments as 'Mephisto' or 'Thomas Payne'. His debut as director in 1975 found important critical acclaim and the attempt to interpret Wolfgang Borchert's 'Draussen vor der Tuer' (The Man Outside) on the background of the Vietnam war showed his talent to guide his colleague actors towards a deep and authentic understanding of their parts. Paul Boesiger died in 1977 in Basel at the age of 48. His son Johannes Boesiger (b 1962) worked with him as directing trainee and became later film critic, scriptwriter and producer.
biography.name: Paul Bösiger

biography.bio: Peter Carsten was born on April 30, 1928 in Weißenburg, Bavaria, Germany as Peter Ramsentaler. He was an actor and producer, known for Dark of the Sun (1968), The Quiller Memorandum (1966) and Stalingrad: Dogs, Do You Want to Live Forever? (1959). He was married to Lilijana and Divna. He died on April 20, 2012 in Lucija, Slovenia.
biography.name: Peter Carsten

biography.bio: Robert Fackler is an actor, known for Dr. Fummel und seine Gespielinnen (1970), Husch, husch ins Körbchen (1969) and Zu dumm zum... (1971).
biography.name: Robert Fackler

biography.bio: Kurt Großkurth was born on May 11, 1909 in Langenselbold, Hesse, Germany. He was an actor, known for Ludwig - Le crépuscule des Dieux (1973), August (1961) and Landarzt Dr. Brock (1967). He was married to Martel Großkurth. He died on May 29, 1975 in Bad Aibling, Bavaria, Germany.
biography.name: Kurt Großkurth

biography.bio: Heini Göbel was born on May 15, 1910 in Frankfurt am Main, Germany as Heinrich Göbel. He was an actor, known for Die zwölf Geschworenen (1963), Der kleine Napoleon (1955) and Die Medaille (1975). He died on September 24, 2009.
biography.name: Heini Göbel

biography.bio: Hannelore Heimanns was born in 1936. She was an actress, known for Weil du arm bist, mußt du früher sterben (1956) and Unter einem Regenschirm... - Eine kleine Traumreise durch verregnete Zeitläufte (1955). She died on December 3, 1956 in Cologne, North Rhine-Westphalia, Germany.
biography.name: Hannelore Heimanns

biography.bio: Trude Hesterberg was born on May 2, 1892 in Berlin, Germany as Gertrud Johanna Dorothea Helene Hesterberg. She was an actress, known for L'histoire du petit Muck (1953), Corinna Schmidt (1951) and Lady Frederick (1963). She was married to Fritz Schönherr. She died on August 31, 1967 in Munich, Bavaria, West Germany.
biography.name: Trude Hesterberg

biography.bio: Fritz Hinz-Fabricius was born on February 7, 1891 in Mährisch-Ostrau, Austria-Hungary. He was an actor, known for Piroschka (1955), Die eiskalte Nacht (1960) and The Glass Tower (1957). He died on August 22, 1968 in Vienna, Austria.
biography.name: Fritz Hinz-Fabricius

biography.bio: Rolf Kralovitz was born on June 15, 1925 in Böhlitz-Ehrenberg, Leipzig, Saxony, Germany. He was an actor, known for Le médecin de Stalingrad (1958), L'espion de Tokyo (1955) and People in the Net (1959). He was married to Brigitte Kralovitz-Meckauer. He died on June 21, 2015 in Cologne, Germany.
biography.name: Rolf Kralovitz

biography.bio: Fritz Lafontaine was born on June 25, 1903 in Fulda, Hesse, Germany. He is known for his work on Die Geige lockt (1935), Casino de Paris (1957) and Der Tiger Akbar (1951). He died on August 31, 1964 in Haar, Bavaria, Germany.
biography.name: Fritz Lafontaine

biography.bio: Siegfried Lowitz was born on September 22, 1914 in Berlin, Germany as Siegfried Wodolowitz. He was an actor, known for The Old Fox (1977), It Happened in Broad Daylight (1958) and Biedermann und die Brandstifter (1967). He was married to Marianne Probst and Elisabeth Felber. He died on June 27, 1999 in Munich, Bavaria, Germany.
biography.name: Siegfried Lowitz

biography.bio: Nora Minor was born on December 7, 1910 in Vienna, Austria-Hungary as Nora Hahn. She was an actress, known for Berlin, Keithstrasse 30 (1972), The Shoemaker (1956) and Das Cello (1966). She died on May 21, 1995 in Munich, Bavaria, Germany.
biography.name: Nora Minor
